question.title: Maximum Average Subtree
question.similarQuestions: [{"title": "Count Nodes Equal to Sum of Descendants", "titleSlug": "count-nodes-equal-to-sum-of-descendants", "difficulty": "Medium", "translatedTitle": null}, {"title": "Count Nodes Equal to Average of Subtree", "titleSlug": "count-nodes-equal-to-average-of-subtree", "difficulty": "Medium", "translatedTitle": null}]
hints: Can you find the sum of values and the number of nodes for every sub-tree ?
Can you find the sum of values and the number of nodes for a sub-tree given the sum of values and the number of nodes of it's left and right sub-trees ?
Use depth first search to recursively find the solution for the children of a node then use their solutions to compute the current node's solution.
